name: INDEX20
description: What is the project about? Crypto Index is a centralized infrastructure of tokenized crypto ETFs. The first product to launch will be Index20 (i20), a tokenized, automated index, containing all the top 20 cryptocurrencies excluding stable coin. What makes your project unique? The index will have full backup of 100% at all given moment, display in the company websites with links to view the reserves on the blockchain itself, don’t trust- verify. Every other week we will modify the portfolio, to make sure every coin and token are holding a share of exactly 5%, no more or less, and if a token falls in or out the top 20, we will make the adjustments based on certain conditions been made to minimize risks and maximize profits. History of your project. we are new in market What’s next for your project? Future products will be i50, i100 and GEMi More to come, stay tuned What can your token be used for? Revolutionizing crypto by bringing mass crypto adoption through simplifying diversification and portfolio management in fully-backed, transparent Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs) in the form of tokens.
